string.text: {=rf_main_quest_start_inquiry_1}As you crossed a small road you came upon a wrenched wagon, turned to pieces. Blood stenched the ground around it and the soil showed signs of a fight. Under the rubble, a voice came out asking for help.
{=rf_main_quest_start_inquiry_2}"They took him...", said a voice of a man, half of his body under the broken wagon. "They ran into the forest, please rescue Uliah...".
{=rf_main_quest_start_inquiry_3}As you stood up, the man gave his last breath, and died, his last words kept echoing on your head...
{=rf_main_quest_start_inquiry_4}The man, with faltering breath, spoke of the hideout's possible location, somewhere where the Elvean kingdom borders meet the north Sea.

{=rf_main_quest_start_inquiry_5}As you entered the forest you catch the tracks of horses, leading deep in the woods. As the trees gave way to open field you saw the trail leading towards a group of hills in the horizon. Sure about the trail, approaching the hills you knew that you could be close to a hideout.
{=rf_first_quest_title}Realms Forgotten Quest: Part One
{=rf_first_quest_objective_1}Rescue the injured man's friend from the hiding place. According to the wounded man he should be somewhere where the borders of the Elvean kingdom meet the North Sea.
{=rf_first_quest_objective_2}Scout Uliah to the Queen {QUEEN.LINK} to receive your ransom reward.
{=rf_first_quest_objective_3}Queen {QUEEN.LINK} asked you to bring 5 zombies to do her research.
{=rf_first_quest_objective_3_task}Captured zombies
{=rf_first_quest_objective_4}Deliver the zombies to the queen
{=rf_map_not_found_inquiry}You can't find the map, but there's no doubt the location is right, maybe you can try again later.
{=rf_uliah_text_1}Thank you for saving my life!
{=rf_uliah_text_2}What these man wanted by kidnapping you ?
{=rf_uliah_text_3}Well, i don't know... they came out of nowhere...
{=rf_uliah_text_4}You are welcome. You are free to go.
{=rf_uliah_text_5}I hope there is somebody that would be glad to give a reward for saving your ass
{=rf_uliah_text_6}I don't believe i am safe alone... i don't know how to handle a sword...
{=rf_uliah_text_7}Well, actually yes... there are people that will reward you...
{=rf_uliah_text_8}If you want to be properly rewarded, i recommend you to scout me to my safety. And that's right under the tutelage of Queen Rinaia.
{=rf_first_quest_queen_text_1}Greetings Queen Rinaia, i saved your vassal from a bandit attack and i came to deliver him to you...
{=rf_first_quest_queen_text_2}You did well bringing my envoy alive. You deserve a reward for this deed. And as you proved yourself worthy, I have a task to offer you.

{=rf_first_quest_queen_text_3}I have heard of abominations stalking the lands of winter, beyond the Nasoria territory. Undead creatures. I need you to bring some of them to be studied by the physicians of the court. We need to know what treat they represent.
{=rf_first_quest_queen_text_4}It depends.
{=rf_first_quest_queen_text_5}You will be kindly rewarded.
{=rf_first_quest_queen_text_6}No, i am not interested.
{=rf_first_quest_queen_small_player_army}You will need a larger army to come into those treacherous parts. Recruit more men first and come back to me.
{=rf_first_quest_queen_small_player_army_1}Greetings Queen Rinaia, now i think i'm ready for your next mission.
{=rf_first_quest_queen_small_player_army_2}I believe you'll not be able to do it with your army, recruit more men first and come back to me.
{=rf_small_player_army_log}Raise your army up to {MINIMUM_AMOUNT} soldiers.
{=rf_soldiers_in_army}Soldiers in army
{=rf_first_quest_hidden_hand_text_1}Stop there stranger. We have no intention to harm you but you have to deliver us your captives.
{=rf_first_quest_hidden_hand_text_2}Why should i ?
{=rf_first_quest_hidden_hand_text_3}Probably you don't know what these creatures are. They are the announcement of a tragedy, that must be avoided at all costs.
{=rf_first_quest_hidden_hand_text_4}What do you mean exactly ?
{=rf_first_quest_hidden_hand_text_5}We have a reason to believe they are just the beginning of a terrible time that is coming upon us. The wrath of some strange power.
{=rf_first_quest_hidden_hand_text_6}Well, that sounds impressive, but no, i am not delivering to you.
{=rf_first_quest_hidden_hand_text_7}Wow that's unexpected... and how much will you attach to it ?
{=rf_first_quest_hidden_hand_text_8}You will have to earn them.
{=rf_first_quest_hidden_hand_text_9}Maybe if you explain me your reasons and attach to it a fat purse.
{=rf_first_quest_hidden_hand_text_10}If it is coins that you most appreciate, here you have 10.000.
{=rf_first_quest_hidden_hand_text_11}Thats a wise choice lad. We are always looking for recruits to our order, and you just made an important step. We have a task to give you, if you are interested.
{=rf_first_quest_hidden_hand_text_12}What do you mean ?
{=rf_first_quest_hidden_hand_text_13}We are searching for some relics that would bring light behind the appearance of these abominations. Find the Relics for us and will be highly recompensated.
{=rf_first_quest_hidden_hand_text_prisoner_1}You are my prisoner now. But for a good reason i let you go.
{=rf_first_quest_hidden_hand_text_prisoner_2}We are here to protect Aeurth, and we will give our lives to it. These monsters, they are here for revenge. Nobody will be spared.
{=rf_first_quest_hidden_hand_text_prisoner_3}Revenge? For what?
{=rf_first_quest_hidden_hand_text_prisoner_4}I will not reveal anymore. Do what you have to do.
{=rf_first_quest_player_deliver_prisoners_text_1}I brought your prisoners. And i would like to know for what beyond money i put my life at risk.
{=rf_first_quest_player_deliver_prisoners_text_2}There is much more behind that than what we see. But to be sure about it, it's too early to make assumptions. I need more proof...
{=rf_first_quest_player_deliver_prisoners_text_3}Proof of what ?
{=rf_first_quest_player_deliver_prisoners_text_4}Proof that these monsters are not only monsters, but the messengers of something old, hidden in the world.
{=rf_first_quest_player_deliver_prisoners_text_5}And what proof are you looking for ?
{=rf_first_quest_player_deliver_prisoners_text_6}A relic. That will point to a place that i hope many of my questions would be answered.
{=rf_first_quest_player_deliver_prisoners_text_7}Are you willing to take that mission? You will be generously recompensated.
{=rf_first_quest_player_deliver_prisoners_text_8}I accept.
{=rf_first_quest_player_deliver_prisoners_text_9}Maybe another time.
{=rf_first_quest_player_deliver_prisoners_text_10}I am here, in case you change your mind.

{=rf_first_quest_player_deliver_prisoners_text_11}There is one of my informants you need to meet. He will be your contact and share all he knows until now about it. He is called under the name of "The Owl".
{=rf_second_quest_title}Realms Forgotten Quest: Part Two
{=rf_second_quest_first_log}Talk to The Owl, he must be in the tavern of the town where the queen lives.
{=rf_second_quest_find_map_log}Owl has showed you the locations that you will search for the map pieces. Find all the parts of the map.
{=rf_second_quest_first_part_log_task}Map parts found
{=rf_second_quest_first_part_log_info}You found {CURRENT_COUNT}/3 parts of the map.
{=rf_the_owl_after_alchemist_text_1}Greetings, i have been sent from Queen Rinaia to support you in case of need. I can see you haven’t taken any of these abominations.
{=rf_the_owl_after_alchemist_text_2}Yes but they have been taken from me.

{=rf_the_owl_after_alchemist_text_3}Anyway, I have another proposition. I have been in a mission for the queen to track a treasure She offered a fat reward. You could join me and we can share the gold...
{=rf_the_owl_after_alchemist_text_4}It seems an interesting proposal.
{=rf_the_owl_after_alchemist_text_5}I don’t give a shit about the queen and it’s better you tell me the locations otherwise you gonna not keep your head too long on you shoulders.
{=rf_the_owl_after_alchemist_text_6}Here is the location of the relics, ...
{=rf_the_owl_after_alchemist_text_7}If that’s the way you want to handle things I tell you.
{=rf_the_owl_text_1}I am looking to the one known as the Owl.
{=rf_the_owl_text_2}Are you ? Did you try checking in the forest ? They usually make their niches on trees...
{=rf_the_owl_text_3}I couldn't tell you would ended up being a comedian. The Queen told me you should be an informer...
{=rf_the_owl_text_4}Queen ?
{=rf_the_owl_text_5}Yes, i am here in the name of Queen Rinaia. She told me i should find the Owl to inform me what i need to know to pursue a relic.
{=rf_the_owl_text_6}I see... in this case, listen carefully: I have risked my life several times to search for some places, what i am led to believe, must be the ruins of an old civilization...
{=rf_the_owl_text_7}But when i approached one of the locations, i was attacked by a group of freaks... dressed in black robes.
{=rf_the_owl_text_8}I escaped alive but only because i managed to put 2 of them down with my blade.
{=rf_the_owl_text_9}It seems i should get some though men to the task...
{=rf_the_owl_text_10}I have no idea who are they and how many they are. I just know that i will not get further alone on that.
{=rf_the_owl_text_11}I assume that's why the Queen asked for my services.
{=rf_the_owl_text_12}Anyway, i will show you the locations you need. I wish you luck.
{=rf_the_owl_text_13}Good luck on your mission.
{=rf_the_owl_intercept_text}I am confident that the Queen will turn her mercy towards you, now we have the relics with us. I believe I know where she would be at this time. Let me scout you there.
{=rf_the_owl_intercept_text_1}I am glad we found you alive. I was not sure what could happen, so I decided to request an army from the queen. We are here to scout you back. She is waiting for you.
{=rf_the_owl_intercept_text_2}Now after I did all the job, that sounds very convenient.
{=rf_the_owl_intercept_text_3}We never now what can happen. War is everywhere nowadays.
{=rf_the_owl_intercept_text_4}I am glad we found you alive. I was not sure what could happen, so I decided to request an army from the queen. We are here to scout you back. She is waiting for you.
{=rf_anorit_lord_text_1}Wait, That’s not the queen. What’s going on here ?
{=rf_anorit_lord_text_2}Calm down lad, there is no need for mistrust. He did what I requested him to do. After you listen what I have to say, you are free to go.
{=rf_anorit_lord_text_3}Of course I am free to go! And I hope it’s worth my time.

{=rf_anorit_lord_text_4}I believe you have no idea what you have on your hands. And much less I believe Queen Rinaia is telling you everything. What you have on your hands it’s not just a relic, but a map. A key to something still to be discovered. Something hidden for thousands of years...
{=rf_anorit_lord_text_5}Humm…

{=rf_anorit_lord_text_6}Listen my lad, even before the Elveans started to bubble their first songs, there were an entire civilization in Aeurth. People of knowledge, that mastered the old ways of arcane magic and Astronomy. The first elvish people arrived on this land and took hold of something precious from them.
{=rf_anorit_lord_text_7}And you can imagine the outcome. There was war. And the elvish people ended up victorious, but also almost decimated.
{=rf_anorit_lord_text_8}I have the belief that the whole of the Elvean songs are made up to make it believe.
{=rf_anorit_lord_text_9}That sounds not very reasonable…

{=rf_anorit_lord_text_10}Are undead walking the world of living reasonable ? In some way, we are sure that this old elvean antagonists had not been totally exterminated. And all this time they were waiting for the chance to exact revenge.
{=rf_anorit_lord_text_11}What the hell... That’s too much to swallow without a drink or two. I am not sure if I take that.
{=rf_anorit_lord_text_12}Believe you or not, the undead walk the world of the living. You have seeing with your own eyes. And now also demons are crossing into our world.
{=rf_anorit_lord_text_13}Demons? And what is my place in all this madness ?

{=rf_anorit_lord_text_14}That’s for you to decide. I am the master of the Anorites, an Order that dedicate itself to the truth of light, the force that lives in the heart of fire. We are here to protect the living. And maybe what you have on your hands can help us in our task to destroy this enemy.
{=rf_anorit_lord_text_15}And maybe not. Maybe I do have a map of a treasure, probably for an ancient civilization, and all you want is to grab it to bring it to your coffers.
{=rf_anorit_lord_text_16}The path of truth is the path of fire. If you are in the truth no harm you come to you. But if not, fire has no mercy.We wil be watching

{=rf_anorit_lord_text_17}You took the right decision. Welcome to the path of Fire. Our scholars will debruce over this relic to decipher it. As soon as its done, we will reach you again to take the next steps. Until then, prepare yourself.
{=rf_guard_text}I hope you have been enjoying our hospitality... You know, we have rules here, and each guest receives what they deserve...
{=rf_guard_option_1}Guest ? I was kidnapped in the middle of the night! What the hell do you want from me ?
{=rf_guard_option_2}The bed is a bit hard, and the toilet stinks, so I can't say I'm really enjoying it.
{=rf_guard_option_3}Is that so ? What do I need to do to get a better room ?

{=rf_kidnapped_text}Even the best of your guards slept on this night, the weight of the long march falling into his shoulders. You barelly noticed the hands that covered your mouth before something hit hard on the back of your head.
{=rf_anorit_quest_title}Deciphering the map.
{=rf_anorit_objective_1}Wait for {ANORIT.LINK} and his scholars to decipher the map.
{=quest_continuation_box_title}Quest End
{=quest_continuation_box_desc}Continues on the next update...
{=rf_anorit_lord_option_1}Deliver the map and serve the order.
{=rf_anorit_lord_option_2}Deny and deliver to the queen.
{=rf_quest_title_part_three}Realms Forgotten Quest: Part Three

{=rf_anorit_message}A messenger approached you while your troops were camped, taking a break from the march. "Some progress have been made at the translation. It is time to meet again. Find your way back into my presence."
{=rf_queen_message}While you have been desappeared owl gave your map to be deciphered by the queen, you must go talk to her now.
{=rf_ityr_arrive_message}Your caravan enters Ityr and you surreptitiously leave the caravan and enter the lords hall.
{=rf_decipher_finished_message}A messenger approaches you and delivers a message. "The deciphering is complete, come at me whenever you are ready."

{=rf_near_hideout_message}As you neared the gate, the howling winds above the mountain peaks grew louder, and the rocky walls seemed to watch your party as if a hidden presence had taken hold of them. A shiver ran down the spines of you and your companions, but there was no doubt that this was the very place you were looking for.
{=rf_third_quest_cannot_leave}You need to find the scholar first!.
{=rf_third_quest_anorit_objective_1}Go talk to {ANORIT.LINK}.
{=rf_third_quest_anorit_objective_2_a}Wait until your caravan arrives at {SETTLEMENT}.
{=rf_third_quest_anorit_objective_2_b}Go to {SETTLEMENT} and try to convince the scholar.
{=rf_third_quest_anorit_objective_3}Wait one day to meet the scholar at {SETTLEMENT}.
{=rf_third_quest_anorit_objective_3_failed}You failed to persuade to scholar, now you'll have to fight him in a battle.
{=rf_third_quest_anorit_objective_4}Go to {SETTLEMENT} and capture the scholar.
{=rf_third_quest_anorit_objective_5}Escort the scholar to {QUESTGIVER.LINK}.
{=rf_third_quest_anorit_objective_5_defeated}Find {SCHOLAR.LINK} and capture him.
{=rf_third_quest_anorit_objective_6}Wait until the scholar deciphers the text.
{=rf_third_quest_anorit_objective_7}Go to the hiding place indicated by {QUESTGIVER.LINK} and defeat the boss. It should be near Ismilkorg village
{=rf_third_quest_anorit_dialog_1}Greetings. You are lucky to be alive... Your men are loyal to you. They sent me scouts with the relics while you were gone.

{=rf_third_quest_anorit_dialog_2}It took a great effort of our scholars to arrive in a unsatisfactory result... The writing is intricate and the only thing they can relate to it is a resemblance to the way the Athanians write. So i am led to believe we need the skills of an Athanian scholar. And that's the task i am willing to give it to you. Bring us an Athanian scholar, by force if necessary.
{=rf_third_quest_anorit_dialog_3}I will need a clever plan...
{=rf_third_quest_anorit_dialog_8}I prefer to go by caravan.
{=rf_third_quest_anorit_dialog_9}I will disguise myself with my soldiers and try to assault him.

{=rf_third_quest_anorit_dialog_4}Scholars are plenty at the courts of the Pharun as wheat in our fields. The Pharun of Ityr is opening his town to celebrate some of his holidays so I planned that you could go as an noble caravan trader along one of our lords that will attend the festivities. That's how you will have access to the town keep inner halls.
{=rf_third_quest_anorit_dialog_5}Humm... not bad. Also i could have access to a larger army and go disguised as bandits and assault that scholar somewhere...
{=rf_third_quest_anorit_dialog_6}That could work, but seems quite risky. If you get caught, and they discover anything we will have war. And i will have to let you to die... Your choice.
{=rf_third_quest_anorit_dialog_7}Any way, which way do you choose ?
{=rf_third_quest_scholar_dialog_1}Excuse me sir, you don't know me but your name is very known among many of the caravan masters in the world. You are know for your interest for special items...
{=rf_third_quest_scholar_dialog_2}Is that so ? with whom am i talking to ?
{=rf_third_quest_scholar_dialog_3}My name is {PLAYER.LINK}. I am a merchant of rare items. And i have something that can interest you.
{=rf_third_quest_scholar_dialog_4}I am listening...
{=rf_third_quest_scholar_dialog_5}I have came into the possession of old text, with writings i have never seen before. It is involved in a very special garment. I am sure it is something unique...
{=rf_third_quest_scholar_dialog_6}And what do you want from me ?
{=rf_third_quest_scholar_dialog_7}Well, maybe if it interests you, i can make an interesting price.
{=rf_third_quest_scholar_dialog_8}I have to take a look first. Do you have it here?
{=rf_third_quest_scholar_dialog_9}Not here, but in my belongings. My caravan is stationed outside the town.
{=rf_third_quest_scholar_dialog_10}Outside... humm, so maybe we can go there another time...
{=rf_third_quest_scholar_dialog_11}Why not now ?
{=rf_third_quest_scholar_dialog_12}Now ? Why such a rush ?
{=rf_third_quest_scholar_dialog_13_persuade_1}Cause there are other buyers waiting my response.
{=rf_third_quest_scholar_dialog_13_persuade_2}I have to leave tomorrow early to proceed my travels.
{=rf_third_quest_scholar_dialog_persuasion_fail}That's too much rush for such a business. I need more time. Lets talk after you come back to these surroundings.
{=rf_third_quest_scholar_dialog_persuasion_success}Ok, meet me in one day at Tasheba.
{=rf_third_quest_scholar_dialog_2_1}So, did you bring the goods ?
{=rf_third_quest_scholar_dialog_2_2}I brought something better, my blade.
{=rf_third_quest_anorit_dialog_2_1}You fulfill my expectations. I see you may have a destiny to something greater. When we have answers one of my messengers will contact you. Here is your reward.

{=rf_third_quest_anorit_dialog_2_2}The relics ended up to be parts of a kind of map. They point to a place somewhere at the Dreadlands. Owl affirmed it is somowhere around the village of Ismilkorg. I have organized an army to accompany you. Are you ready?
{=rf_third_quest_anorit_dialog_2_3}Yes. Lets do it!
{=rf_third_quest_anorit_dialog_2_4}No, i need more time
{=rf_third_quest_anorit_dialog_2_5}Come back to me when you are ready.
{=rf_third_quest_boss_dialog_1}What do you think you have gained by storming upon us? The gate is already open, and they roam the world freely. Your future is bleak.
{=rf_third_quest_boss_dialog_2}They? Who are you referring to?
{=rf_third_quest_boss_dialog_3}You're naive. The time of reckoning is upon us. The dark lords shall bring our vengeance. Soon, you will understand.
{=rf_third_quest_boss_dialog_4}I've had enough of your ramblings. You'll pay for your crimes with your life.
{=rf_third_quest_boss_dialog_5}You'll have ample time to explain everything from the confines of a dungeon cell.
{=rf_third_quest_boss_dialog_4_owl}My lord, it isn't worth it. We need him alive to reveal the truth about all of this. Please, let's bring him to face royal justice.
{=town_athas_quest_option}Try to persuade the scholar
{=rf_quest_title_part_four}Realms Forgotten Quest: Part Four
{=rf_fourth_quest_first_log}Take the hideout boss to the {LORD.LINK}.
{=rf_fourth_quest_second_log}Go to the monastery and talk to the monks. It should be near the village Borchovagorka
{=rf_fourth_quest_third_log}Capture a hellbound outlaw to extract information.
{=rf_fourth_quest_first_dialog_1}What was that? Not only are these lands plagued by rising undead, but now demons threaten the world of the living! We are damned...
{=rf_fourth_quest_first_dialog_2}We've survived this attack by sheer luck, or perchance some force watches over us. We must find a way to confront this evil... but who are they?

{=rf_fourth_quest_first_dialog_3}Hmmm... As I told you when we first met, I have tracked those black-robed cultists to the places where you retrieved the texts. The sigil they carry on their robes do not relate to any faction I know.
{=rf_fourth_quest_first_dialog_4}Their leader spoke of avenging themselves... Could that be a clue?
{=rf_fourth_quest_first_dialog_5}It could be. We need more answers. Let us pick up their trail!
{=rf_fourth_quest_first_dialog_6}We could, but how far can we go only the two uf us? We need to alert Queens and Kings about this matter. I see no other way.
{=rf_fourth_quest_first_dialog_7}Yes, but how? Reporting we have demons marching into our world? Without any proof, we will be ridiculed!
{=rf_fourth_quest_first_dialog_8}True... capturing the undead worked to have the Queen engaged. We need to find a similar way to convince them.
{=rf_fourth_quest_first_dialog_9}And not only the Realms of Men... IF we are indeed to confront more of such creatures, we need to look after all the kingdoms.

{=rf_fourth_quest_first_dialog_10}So we need something bigger, something that will leave no doubt... we need to capture some of these evil beings. But these cultists are something else. We need more than just a few soldiers.
{=rf_fourth_quest_first_dialog_11}Maybe stronger weapons?
{=rf_fourth_quest_first_dialog_12}What do you mean?

{=rf_fourth_quest_first_dialog_13}I've traveled far and wide, for many years serving as a spy and messenger for Queen Rinaia. Once I had come across a monastic order; they were known for their expertise with concotions. The common folk claimed they were holy people... What if not holy but sorcerers?
{=rf_fourth_quest_first_dialog_14}Do you mean Magic? Pursuing magic is under penalty of death.

{=rf_fourth_quest_first_dialog_15}And yet, undead and demons? Do they make any more sense? They must be creatures born of magic, albeit a dark one...Magic or Faith, Holy Men or Sorcerers, whats the diference? The folk regard them to be of a good nature. We have nothing to loose.
{=rf_fourth_quest_first_dialog_16}I see... Where are we heading to?
{=rf_fourth_quest_first_dialog_17}We need to travel to Borchovagorka. There at the hills we will find a monastery.
{=rf_fourth_quest_monk_dialog_1}Excuse me, sir. We've heard a lot about your deeds through the folk around these parts. They say you are holy men...
{=rf_fourth_quest_monk_dialog_2}Good day, brother. These are kind words, but we are no holy people, only dedicated hermits. How can we serve you?

{=rf_fourth_quest_monk_dialog_3}What we have to say may be difficult to swallow at first... We have recently been in battle, facing an enemy with an otherworldly nature... Aware that this probably would not reach the ears of Lords, we have no other choice but to seek counceling from those who walk the path of knowledge and spiritual matters...
{=rf_fourth_quest_monk_dialog_4}Hmmm, I see. And to what otherworldly nature are you referring?
{=rf_fourth_quest_monk_dialog_5}Beings not from this world. Demons.

{=rf_fourth_quest_monk_dialog_6}Demons?... The common folk have a plethora of them. But I sense enough seriousness on your gaze that gives me the impression you are not bringing this matter forth merely out of imagination.
{=rf_fourth_quest_monk_dialog_7}Absolutely not, sir. We barely escaped with our lives.
{=rf_fourth_quest_monk_dialog_8}I need to bring your claim to our council. But they will ask for more proof.
{=rf_fourth_quest_monk_dialog_9}I have found that in one of their hideouts. Take it.
{=rf_fourth_quest_monk_dialog_10}How should i name you sir ?
{=rf_fourth_quest_monk_dialog_11}My name is {PLAYER.LINK}.

{=rf_fourth_quest_monk_dialog_12}The artefact you have brought to us is something very rare. I am almost certain you do not know what it refers to. In the old era, there were a ruling civilization in Aeurth. I am talking about a time before the Elveans themselves. Many of our scholars dedicate to the study of their past and they have found very little accounts of that time, apart of some very rare sites, mostly scattered ruins.

{=rf_fourth_quest_monk_dialog_13}That stone tablet seems to contain a set of instructions, but we need more time to understand it. The interested of our order lies on the knowledge they had about nature and the movement of the stars. Maybe that can bring us closer to it... They seemed to be a highly developed culture.
{=rf_fourth_quest_monk_dialog_14}And how did they came to desappear leaving so little behind ?
{=rf_fourth_quest_monk_dialog_15}That's something that still puzzle us. But we have found some evidence that binds the Elvean past to them. Where did you find it this artefact ?

{=rf_fourth_quest_monk_dialog_16}It is a long story but to make it short, we were in a official mission. But we did not expect to come across supernatural creatures, much less to fight demons. And they were many. I fear that is threat to everyone, everywhere!

{=rf_fourth_quest_monk_dialog_17}The existence of the undead is fact known for several years by now. But what kind of force is behind those abominations is still a mistery. The news of demons makes it worse...

{=rf_fourth_quest_monk_dialog_18}That´s what brought as here, hoping to find help to defeat them. We aim to capture one of these creatures as proof to raise the Kingdoms against them, but our army have been reduced to the two of us.
{=rf_fourth_quest_monk_dialog_19}Indeed we are not only an order of monks, but a military one as well. And as alchemists we hold on weapons that can help. We will send you some of our men.
{=rf_fourth_quest_owl_dialog_1}You know, inside that mountain, I found something... I've been keeping it hidden.
{=rf_fourth_quest_owl_dialog_2}Hidden? What did you find?
{=rf_fourth_quest_owl_dialog_3}I kept hidden cause i am not sure what is it. But after that attack, we were lucky that i havent lost i... It looked important, so I hid it.
{=rf_fourth_quest_owl_dialog_4}It is a kind of stone tablet, with inscriptions... Do you have any idea what it is ?
{=rf_fourth_quest_owl_dialog_5}No clue. But it felt... significant. I think you should have it. After all, we wouldn't have made it out without you.
{=rf_fourth_quest_hellbound_dialog_1}Who are you? What do you want?
{=rf_fourth_quest_hellbound_dialog_2}We are the voice of the past, the whispers of the dead under the snow.
{=rf_fourth_quest_hellbound_dialog_player_1}What is agenda? i dont understand such kind of answer. I am willing to know to see what side you are fighting for.
{=rf_fourth_quest_hellbound_dialog_npc_1}I already said. We are nothing but the shadows of days gone. The ghosts that came to calim vengeance.
{=rf_fourth_quest_hellbound_dialog_player_1_wrong}I advise you to open your mouth and tell me who you are before it can be closed forever.
{=rf_fourth_quest_hellbound_dialog_npc_1_wrong}Hahaha, do you think I am afraid of pain ? Your days are numbered.
{=rf_fourth_quest_hellbound_dialog_player_2}You don't know me either. I don't fight under any banner; I am the owner of my own destiny. If your cause is fair, I may follow.

{=rf_fourth_quest_hellbound_dialog_npc_2}Ah So you promise... The land you are standing over has been usurped from its original sons and daughters. For thousands of years, their bodies deep under the ice have been a prison for their souls, crying out for revenge. That is our cause. To bring justice to the usurpers.

{=rf_fourth_quest_hellbound_dialog_player_2_wrong}Whatever your cause is, it dwells in dark magic. The kind of creatures you are calling upon the world will bring only misery and destruction. It is better you reveal your plans, or I will extract them from you with pain...
{=rf_fourth_quest_hellbound_dialog_npc_2_wrong}Hahaha, do you think I am afraid of pain? The pain that will unleash over the world is beyond your comprehension.
{=rf_fourth_quest_hellbound_dialog_player_5_success}Who are the usurpers ?

{=rf_fourth_quest_hellbound_dialog_npc_5_success}You know nothing about this world. Those who call themselves the firstborn, who pretend to be the carriers of light and good. Their forefathers were assassins, erasing thousands of lives to steal a land that did not belong to them. But that's enough, I have nothing else to say. The dawn of time is upon us...
{=rf_quest_title_part_four}Realms Forgotten Quest: Part Five
We should bring this one to somebody that can loosen his tongue...
Aye, i have had to rely in certain recipes to retrieve information before, things a spy must have under his sleeves...
And can you do that now?
I cannot make it myself, but i know somebody that can help us on that. It will not be a short journey, but i trust it will bring a solution.
We've captured this one, but we've gleaned naught from him. Might thee have a method?
Aye, we do. We needn't force his tongue, but a concoction or two will loosen his lips and reveal his thoughts.

He didn't reveal as much as i desired to shed light upon an enigma that my long deceased order has given its existence to unveil... but he gave me enough to bring us very close. The undead lords, they are indeed the Vortiak warriors who perished in the Great War. However, this prisoner is not among the undead. They serve different masters...
And who are these masters?

The names he whispered carried the weight of ancient power, tied closely to the Vortiak people—known for their deep and unbreakable connection to the Old Gods. In the belief system of the Vortiaks, the concepts of good and evil were not as clear-cut as we think. Instead, they perceived the universe through the lens of negative and positive forces, both essential to the delicate equilibrium of the world... In this manner, the Vortiak priests nurtured a pantheon divided between gods of creation and gods of destruction. I am led to believe that they are trying to bring those latter forces to wreak havoc upon the world.
That doesn't sound very good... So, this sect is trying to bring those gods into our world?
Not the gods themselves, but their servants.
You could call them Argothes, or the shadows of many faces.
For what purpose do they want to bring those creatures into our world?
Only if, somehow, the bloodline of the Vortiaks survived, and they want to erase the world for the birth of a new one.
These Vortiaks, when did they actually exist?
According to Elvean songs, around 2000 years ago.
That's impossible... a bloodline preserved for so long?
Not as impossible as you might think. Our order has already lasted 600 years.
Hmm... and what now?
It is up to you... If the Vortiak priests are indeed so powerful, as you've already witnessed, and 'demons' are running wild, they need to be stopped.
How can I stop such a supernatural force?

I don't know. What I do know is that the time of the Vortiaks was known as the Era of the Dragon's Moon. Under that moon, magic was alive, and the world was populated with wonderful beasts. At that time, it was used to create relics where magic could be stored. Our order has found some of these relics, and we have learned much from them to enhance our healing arts... We believe that those relics have also taken the form of weapons. Beneath the snow and ice, where we see only cold, lie the ruins and old palaces of the Vortiaks, unknown to men.
We need more than that to begin with!
I think I know a place where we could start...
Really? And where is that?
A place where, long ago, when I was a motivated treasure seeker, I haven't had the chance to come back. A place where I believe lies the tomb of an ancient king.
I see, even if I find a weapon there, I don’t think that will be enough. We need all the armies of the world if we are to face such power.
Yes, you're right. But maybe in possession of something from the old world, we could convince the kings and queens to believe us.
Maybe... I see no other choice.
For what reason dost thou intrude upon the lands of the Nasorians, stranger? Speak swiftly and with purpose.
Hail, Your Majesty. We bring dire tidings. We have faced adversaries beyond mortal ken, beings not bound by this world. We are convinced they muster their forces, a threat to all life.
Haha, a tale as peculiar as any... And what power could challenge the might of the Nasorians?
With respect, Your Majesty, demons, spawn of darkness…
There is a power that can challenge all the Realms of the world together, and thats no joke.
Hahahahha... that is all I need to hear. Amidst the strength of the Nasorians, now we must confront unearthly malevolence…
With respect, Your Majesty, what we speak is true... and we believe they may be kin to ancient adversaries of the Elveans, a folk once known as the Vortiaks...
Mind thy tongue, stranger, lest thou utter blasphemies that may cost thee dearly!
Nay, Your Majesty, we have sought counsel from the wise, who vouch for our claims. It is not only me that saw it.
Your Majesty, we possess an artifact rare, which may shed light upon this darkness.
And where are these wise men now? The Nasorians value strength and action. Why hath this threat not been brought before me?
Indeed? And where might this artifact be found?
They reside far from here, Your Majesty, individuals who possess knowledge from distant lands.
Behold, Your Majesty, a blade I unearthed from the depths of a mountain, guarded by the most formidable of creatures…
Do these individuals speak with the stars...? I should have thee removed for bringing such folly to my presence. Depart, or face my wrath!
What sorcery is this? That blade holds no significance to the Nasorians! If thou seek to sway the hearts of my people, you need to prove yourself the warrior you claim to be
And what would that be, Your Majesty?
Bring me the head of this evil. Or one of flesh and bone i can see for myself!.
And now, whither shall we fare?

I feel a strange power, as though it hath life... If what we know holds true, in the days of yore, the Elveans and the Vortiaks waged dire war. We should seek audience with the Elvean king. But we must tread with care; who knows what peril awaits us...
It doth ring true, and I sense the lurking danger. What if this tale is not meant to be unveiled? It could bring doom upon us...
'Tis a risk we must brave.
For what reason do you dare cross my path, stranger? It had better be good.
Hail, Your Majesty. We bring dire tidings. We have faced foes beyond mortal ken, beings not of this world. We are convinced they gather their forces, a threat to all life.
Haha, a tale as strange as any... And what manner of power could challenge my rule?
With respect, Your Majesty, demons, spawn of darkness…
Hahahahha... that is all I need to hear. Amidst wars aplenty, now I must contend with unearthly malice…
With respect, Your Majesty, what we speak is true... and we believe they may be kin to ancient adversaries of the Elveans, a folk once known as 'the Vortiaks'...
Watch thy tongue, stranger, lest thou spout blasphemies that may cost thee dearly!
Nay, Your Majesty, we have sought counsel from the learned, who vouch for our claims!
Your Majesty, we possess an artifact rare, which may illuminate this darkness.
And where are these learned folk now? The wisest sages of Aeurth reside within my domain. Why has this threat not been brought before me?
Indeed? And where might this artifact be found?
They dwell afar, Your Majesty, members of an order who shun worldly affairs. Yet they hold ancient wisdom.
Behold, Your Majesty, a blade I unearthed from the depths of a mountain, guarded by the most formidable of creatures…
Dost thou claim these sages commune with the dead...? I should have thee removed for bringing such folly to my presence. Depart, or face imprisonment!
What sorcery is this? That blade do looks like something rare, but means naught to me! If thou seek to sway my people's hearts, thou must bring forth a treasure dear to them.
And what would that be, milord?
A treasure of our people, the crown of King Ulvor...And to sway my will, a head of one of those evil!
Well, if we have to find a treasure that could be of importance to the king, the only thing that comes to my mind is to search for somebody I have met.
And who would that be?
When we first met, I was chatting with that suspicious figure who claims to deal with relics and items that have magic powers... It sounds like an obvious lead, doesn't it?
Yes, it sounds like it is. Will we find him there again?
I believe so. And I also believe he doesn't work alone.
Greetings, stranger. What can I do for you?
We are looking for a special item, and we heard that's exactly your job. We're searching for the crown of King Ulvor.

Ahhh, this one... You've managed to be both lucky and unlucky at the same time. I did get my hands on that relic, yes, but some time ago... It was actually delivered to someone of noble birth, none other than the Khan of the AllKhuur. It happened to be a gift for his coming of age.
Why him? Why not King Belvor?

I don't know... Khuurens are a very esoteric folk, with their spirits and entities. Who knows what the Khan would do with that relic? Perhaps indulge in mystical powers over the Realms of Men? Anyway, that's all I have to tell you.
All Khuurens kings have a tradition to celebrate their birthday at their sacred temple, at the great lake. If we have to go somewhere, we should start there.
But I suppose that temple will be heavily guarded. So it seems more fight is underway.
Or maybe we can sneak inside, and if it's there, we steal it and run.
I hope so.
For what reason dost thou cross my path, stranger? It must needs be a weighty cause.
Hail, Milord. We bear grim tidings. We have encountered foes beyond mortal ken, creatures not of this realm. We are convinced they muster an army that shall oppose all that draws breath.
Haha, 'tis indeed a strange tale... And what manner of power might match my host?
With due respect, Milord, demons, spawn of darkness…
Hahahahha... that is all I need to hear. Not only do I grapple with wars aplenty, now I must confront supernatural malice…
With due respect, Milord, what we speak is true... and we believe they may be kin to ancient foes of the Elveans, a folk once known as 'the Vortiaks'...
Beware thy tongue, stranger, lest thou utter blasphemies that may cost thee thy head!
Nay, Milord, we have delved deep and consulted sages who can vouch for our claims!
Milord, we possess a rarity that may shed light upon this darkness.
And where be these sages now? The greatest savants of Aeurth are the priests of the High Kingdom. Why hath this threat not been brought afore me?
Indeed? And where might it be found?
They reside far hence, Milord, belonging to an order that shuns the world's affairs. Yet they hold ancient wisdom.
Behold, Milord, a blade I found in the bowels of a mountain, guarded by the strangest of beasts…
Dost thou claim these sages commune with the departed...? I should tear thy tongue for bringing such folly to my court. Begone, or I shall have thee imprisoned!
What sorcery is this? That blade belongs to mine ancestors! How came it into thy possession?
As thou commandest, Milord, I shall depart forthwith.
'Tis a tale of trials and strife, yet through battle and survival against those creatures, I was led to it. I deem it a weapon crucial in our struggle against this evil!

That blade is a relic of our kin, yet if it hath found its way to thee, our ancestors must have willed it so and bestowed their blessings upon thee. Seeing this evil's potency, thou shalt find our forces by thy side. But I make no such promise for other realms…
I take upon myself the mission to spread word and rally the support of other sovereigns.
May our ancestors guide thy path!
We should not give up. Lets talk to king of Men.” the player must them search for King Belvor II.
And now, where shall we venture?

I sense a peculiar power, almost as if it's alive... If what we know holds true, in the ancient annals, the Elveans and the Vortiaks clashed in fierce battle. We must seek audience with King Belvor II. But we must tread carefully; who knows what wrath awaits us...
It does ring true, and I sense lurking danger. What if this tale is not meant to be revealed? It could spell ruin for us...
'Tis a risk we must brave.
Owl dialog if elvean persuasion failed
Owl dialog if realms of men persuasion failed
Owl dialog if nasorian persuasion failed

Time is passing and i am afraid those demons are growing in power. I am not sure if we have enough time to convince the other kings... what if they follow the same fashion and oblige us to prove our message?

That is very probable... We need to gather forces with other means, mercenary contracts, persuaded prisoners, it doent matter who. What matters is that we need to bring one of the lords of this evil down and prove our valor. And deliver him as a prisoner to the other kings.
That sounds clearly the most straight of the paths we have to follow. May the gods be at our side.
What are you doing ? This is sacred relic, put it back now!
Make me.
Here is the relic you asked.
I'm rewarding you with some of my soldiers.
Here is the nelrog you asked.
Go back to the monastery and talk to the monk.
Find the mystical weapon in the frozen island at North.
Talk to the elvean king.
Talk to the king of the Realms of Men.
Go talk to the magic seller to find clues about the treasure.
Go to the temple indicated by Owl to require the treasure and deliver it to the king of the Realms of Men, the temple should be near {CLOSEST_SETTLEMENT}.
Talk to the nasorian king.
Deliver one nelrog to the nasorian king.
Take one lord as a prisoner and deliver him to the king of Al Khuur.

{=rf_i_agree}I agree.
